at.fhv.ssc.Rectangle

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.fhv.ssc.Rectangle.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    The Rectangle class provides a Rectangle and different geometric methods to manipulate the object.
    Since:
    2017-03-14
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Oliver Heil - fhv.at

      • zoomAt

        public void zoomAt(double factor)
        Zoom the Rectangle by a given factor. The zoom applied from the middle. > 1 Increase the Size < 1 Decrease the Size 0 || 1 nothing change
        Parameters:
        factor - Factor to Zoom.

      • divideTo4
